translations: [金融]存款人，寄托人（depositor 的复数）

sentences.sentence: There was a widely-held belief that Switzerland was irresistible to wealthy foreigners, mainly because of its numbered accounts and bankers' reluctance to ask awkward questions of depositors.
sentences.translation: 人们普遍认为，瑞士对富有的外国人来说是不可抗拒的，主要是因为它的账户编号，以及银行家不愿向储户提出尴尬的问题。

sentences.sentence: Depositors promptly rushed to withdraw their money.
In that case, the bank can pay interest to depositors.
sentences.translation: 这样，银行就可以向存款人支付利息了。
